makeup.title: MYGLAMM LIT LIQUID MATTE LIPSTICK - SUGAR MAMA
makeup.brand: Moringa Oil Enriched Matte Lipstick
makeup.details: You found The One! Trust us, ladies, this liquid matte lipstick will be your new love! The LIT Liquid Matte Lipstick by MyGlamm gives you soft, kiss-proof lips, no smudges or transfers, just pure, intense colour! Best of all, its enriched with Moringa Oil that moisturises and smoothens dry, damaged lips.

makeup.title: MYGLAMM LIT CREAMY MATTE LIPSTICK - TOM COLLINS
makeup.brand: Precision Perfect Matte Slimstick
makeup.details: Tom Collins is a dusty rose pink that’ll pair well with your favourite floral outfit. It is also PETA Approved cruelty-free and vegan.  Play up those pouts with hues for every mood. With the LIT Creamy Matte Lipsticks by MyGlamm, we've got the best of both worlds – a mad matte finish in an oh-so-creamy texture! You also get long-staying power and intense colour payoff - what else could a girl ask for? The controlled slimstick design ensures perfect precision with every swipe of colour - no smudges!

makeup.title: MYGLAMM K.PLAY FLAVOURED LIPSTICK - RASPBERRY PUNCH
makeup.brand: Raspberry Flavoured Vitamin E-enriched Creamy Lipstick
makeup.details: Raspberry Punch is a blood red shade with pink undertones. The vitamin C and antioxidants found in raspberries reduce the signs of ageing and protect your skin from sun damage; it's spf for your lips!

makeup.title: PERFECT CURVES MATTE LIP CRAYON - SIREN
makeup.brand: Moisturising Matte Lipstick
makeup.details: MyGlamm's Perfect Curves is an expertly curated collection of hydrating creamy matte lipsticks, these playful pencils give you lipstick and liner in a finish that lasts. Our ultra-smooth cream lipstick delivers intensely saturated color with just one swipe. Designed to define, enhance and shape your lips, Perfect Curves lipsticks are enriched with natural oils to nourish and condition your pout on the go!

makeup.title: PERFECT CURVES MATTE LIP CRAYON - SIREN
makeup.brand: PERFECT CURVES
makeup.details: Say hello to the oh-so-comfy, nourishing matte formula of MyGlamm LIT Matte About It Lip Colour. Powered by 3 hydrating ingredients – Moringa Oil, Castor Oil and Vitamin E for crack-free, luscious lips. Just one effortless swipe of this  matte lipstick imparts high-intensity pigment for that long-lasting, no-budge, no-bleed dance of colour. So no brownie points for guessing your next favourite matte lipstick crayon! Now, pick yours from this range of 12 ‘Gram-worthy shades or grab ‘em all to channel that main character energy. *wink wink*

makeup.title: MANISH MALHOTRA LIQUID MATTE LIPSTICK - LADIES NIGHT
makeup.brand: Long-stay Velvet Matte Lip Colour
makeup.details: Who says glamour is only about the glitz? The Manish Malhotra Liquid Matte Lipstick exclusively by MyGlamm is the only haute number you’ll need on a night out. Highly pigmented, this liquid lipstick mattifies into weightless velour on your lips.

makeup.title: MYGLAMM LIT 2 IN 1 LIQUID MATTE LIPSTICK - STARGAZER
makeup.brand: Intense, transfer-proof, long-lasting liquid lipstick duos
makeup.details: Whether you’re channelling your inner Beyoncé or Sasha Fierce there’s a shade for every person and their alter egos! The LIT 2 in 1 Liquid Matte Lipstick by MyGlamm gives you soft, kiss-proof lips, no smudges or transfers, just pure, intense colour!

makeup.title: POPXO MAKEUP - NO DRAMA - MINI LIP KIT
makeup.brand: Mini Lipstick kit with 3 creamy-matte nude lipsticks
makeup.details: No Drama - Mini Lipstick Kit is a set of 3 gorgeous creamy-matte nude lipsticks that will add a little extra something to your #NoMakeup selfies. No-fuss, no-frills, just dreamy lippies that you can pair with just about anything. This mini lip kit includes 3 irresistible nude lipsticks - one for every mood, duh. These mini lipsticks set have a creamy, matte formula that glides on the lips smoothly and wears comfortably for long hours. The pigmented formula delivers rich colour payoff in one swipe and is designed to be suitable for all Indian skin tones.   "I have too many lipsticks" - said no one ever! That's because we know the real power of a good lipstick on a bad day.

makeup.title: MYGLAMM POSE HD LIPSTICK - PEACH PINK
makeup.brand: HD Long-wear Matte Lipstick
makeup.details: Pucker up ladies, those pouts are about to get a dose of high definition colour. The POSE Matte Lipstick by MyGlamm is matte with moisture, enriched with Moringa oil and Vitamin E for plump, hydrated lips. It also prevents flaking and lends a soft focus effect for your #nofilter selfies.

makeup.title: ULTIMATTE LONG-STAY MATTE LIPSTICK - PROMISCUOUS
makeup.brand: Hyaluronic Acid-enriched, Moisturising, Matte Slim Lipstick
makeup.details: You’ll fall in love with these 12 shades of MyGlamm Ultimatte Long Stay Matte Lipsticks—pure, pigment-rich colour that glides on, stays in place and wears like a dream. At the heart of this innovative formula, hyaluronic filling spheres and silicon butter smooth and fill lips with moisture, delivering a silky smooth matte finish that never feels dry - making your pout the perfect date night accessory.

makeup.title: LIT LIQUID MATTE LIPSTICK + SUPERFOODS KAJAL + LIT VELVET MATTE LIQUID LIPSTICK
makeup.brand: Moringa Oil Enriched Matte Lipstick & Long-Wear Smudge-Proof Kajal Infused With Natural Superfood Extracts & Hydrating, Velvet Matte Liquid Lipcolour
makeup.details: You found The One! Trust us, ladies, this liquid matte lipstick will be your new love! The LIT Liquid Matte Lipstick by MyGlamm gives you soft, kiss-proof lips, no smudges or transfers, just pure, intense colour! Best of all, its enriched with Moringa Oil that moisturises and smoothens dry, damaged lips.

haircare.title: POPXO DE-TAN JAM INSTANT BRIGHTENING YOGHURT SHEET MASK
haircare.brand: Sheet Mask For a Post-sun Glow Up
haircare.details: After an extra-savage day in the sun, your skin needs some de-tanning and extra TLC. Enter the POPxo De-Tan Jam Instant Brightening Yoghurt Sheet Mask that’s the all-star, 20-minute miracle for brighter, renewed skin. Packed with skin-loving ingredients like Apricot, Yoghurt, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Agarwood and Sandalwood, there’s nothing this OG sheet mask can’t do. It reduces pigmentation, dullness and dark spots caused by a day in the sun and restores moisture to your skin. The Vitamin E found in Apricots brings back lost elasticity and reduces wrinkles. It brightens and tones skin for a healthy glow - all in a biodegradable sheet with a refreshing Apricot scent that’ll have you hyped for mask-time. Get ready to enjoy long days in the sun with the best after-sun ritual to look forward to!

Additionally, shea butter provides that extra boost of intense hydration that your skin needs. Along with these, this daily use of face cream also brightens your skin, prevents sun damage & boosts collagen, thanks to its antioxidant content.

This replenishing eye cream is infused with hyaluronic acid, Marine Complex 5 which is a blend of nutrient-rich seaweed and algae extracts and shea butter. The hyaluronic acid gel network traps moisture within the skin layer, leaving your under-eye area refreshed and moisturized. On application, the cream melts into skin for rich, long-lasting hydration. Shea butter firms and nourishes the skin while reducing the appearance of dark circles. So that you look fresh and wide-awake even after sleepless nights.

skincare.details: Changing sleep patterns taking a toll on your under-eye skin? Let this superfood-infused eye cream come to the rescue. Formulated with Thai avocado extracts, this  eye cream is packed with fatty acids,  vitamin A, B & E that help nourish, heal & brighten your under-eye area. Not only does this eye cream reduce dark circles, but it also helps in achieving younger-looking, even-toned skin around your eyes.

skincare.details: Say goodbye to dry and dull skin with MyGlamm SUPERFOODS Cacao & Berries Body Lotion. Enriched with antioxidant-rich ingredients like Cacao butter, Strawberry, Mulberry and Black Currant, this body lotion helps fight free radical damage. The non-sticky formula with Superfoods extracts quickly absorbs into the skin and boosts its natural glow. Humectants in it hydrate the outer layers of skin and form a protective barrier that helps to prevent moisture loss, thus improving the skin’s appearance. Cacao & Berries body lotion also contains Aquaxyl that strengthens the skin’s moisture barrier, Shea butter that deeply nourishes the skin, Hyaluronic Acid that hydrates the skin and Pentavitin that helps heal extremely dry skin. Along with these, the body lotion  also has Vitamin B5 with anti-inflammatory properties that soothe irritated skin. Use it every day post-shower and stay nourished all day long!

So give your skin a long-lasting moisture boost with this watermelon & aloe vera body lotion & get soft, supple skin all day long!

skincare.title: MYGLAMM 10% NIACINAMIDE CLARIFYING SERUM ENRICHED WITH MORINGA & TIGER GRASS
skincare.brand: Clinically Tested, Highly Concentrated Face Serum with Niacinamide & Natural Extracts
skincare.details: A non-sticky texture serum that delivers your daily dose of Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), antioxidants, and nourishing natural ingredients that balance sebum activity and intensely hydrate parched skin. This mineral-oil free, dermatologically tested formula revitalizes your skin with 10% highly concentrated, pure niacinamide and zinc PCA. This powerful component not only helps control oil production but also defends against redness and reduces blemishes, dark spots and acne scars. The formula is enriched with natural actives including moringa and tiger grass that have antimicrobial properties and nourish skin. Additional ingredients in face serum include rose water which tones skin, and zinc PCA which regulates sebum levels.

skincare.title: MYGLAMM 3% HYALURONIC ACID HYDRATING SERUM ENRICHED WITH KAKADU PLUM & MARINE ALGAE
skincare.brand: Clinically Tested, Highly Concentrated Face Serum with Hyaluronic Acid & Natural Extracts
skincare.details: A non-sticky serum that delivers an extra boost of hydration to your daily skincare routine. This mineral-oil free, dermatologically tested formula is developed with 3% highly concentrated, pure hyaluronic acid. It helps the skin retain moisture, delivering a boost of much-needed hydration. This face serum is also infused with natural actives - kakadu plum and marine algae. They have antioxidant properties that reduce blemishes and dark spots. The ultimate serum for dull, dehydrated skin as it quenches and restores moisture, leading to fresh, plump and soft skin that looks refreshed. Use this serum with our 5% Vitamin C Brightening Serum for best results.

skincare.title: MYGLAMM 1% MULTI-PEPTIDE COLLAGEN BOOSTING SERUM ENRICHED WITH SWEET ALMOND & MARULA
skincare.brand: Clinically Tested, Highly Concentrated Face Serum with Multi-Peptide & Natural Extracts
skincare.details: A non-sticky texture serum that restores and rejuvenates skin while fighting the early signs of ageing. This mineral-oil free, dermatologically tested formula is infused with multi-peptide collagen and ceramides. Multiple-peptide collagen helps in regenerating skin cells while ceramide strengthens the broken skin barrier and regenerates the sensitized, damaged skin. The result? Plump and firmer-looking skin. This unique formulation is enriched with natural actives - sweet almond, marula and bergamot. Serum have antioxidant and antimicrobial properties that allow skin to repair itself and correct visible damage. A special, additional infusion of liquorice and Tasmanian pepper berry extract lends anti-inflammatory properties to this serum, and it also reduces the appearance of dark spots. And, to battle dry, flaky skin a rich emollient known as allantoin and vitamin E have been infused to increase smoothness in skin. This potent skin rejuvenator is also infused with hyaluronic acid which recharges parched skin for maximum hydration and makes it visibly smoother. Prep and prime your skin with the perfect combination of science and nature for the softest skin ever!

Almonds have antioxidant properties that help guard your skin against damage caused by free radicals and helps reduce the effects of ageing. Olive oil, vitamin E and aloe vera serve as soothing and moisturising agents, leaving the skin feeling soft all day.

Both are antioxidant rich; help improve uneven skin tone, reduce inflammation and puffiness, while calming the skin.
